thankYou.text3: We appreciate your trust in our expertise.

homeBrings.bring2detail2: Diagnose why a property isn't selling
homeBrings.bring3: I want to manage family property
homeBrings.title: What brings you here today?

homeFaq.faq1question: Why do I need this if I already have a real estate agent?
homeFaq.faq1answer: Agents want the deal to close. We don’t sell property, so we have no reason to hide the truth. We provide the unbiased data on prices, risks, and repairs that agents might downplay.
homeFaq.faq2question: How do you spot a bad purchase?
homeFaq.faq2answer: We look beyond the surface. We analyze 10 years of historical data and 5-year price forecasts, hidden legal disputes, and the real cost of renovations. We apply top market AI forecasting tools that are worth the best minds of real estate analytics. If the numbers show the house is a mistake, we tell you.
homeFaq.faq3question: Why is my property not selling?
homeFaq.faq3answer: We don’t just "try harder." We run a diagnosis to find the specific "blocker," whether it’s the price, the presentation, or a neighborhood issue, so you can fix it and move on.
homeFaq.faq4question: How do I know if my rental contracts are protecting me?
homeFaq.faq4answer: We perform a legal audit. Laws change constantly, and we make sure your leases follow the latest rules so you don’t face fines or get stuck with a "professional tenant" you can’t evict.
homeFaq.faq5question: Can you actually help me get more rent from my property?
homeFaq.faq5answer: Yes. We analyze your local market to see if you should switch to short-term, student, or long-term rentals. We also check if you can legally convert unused space, like a garage, into a new income stream.
homeFaq.title: You Ask, We Answer

homeServices.service1Description: Avoid hidden costs. We check the building's condition and legal paperwork so you don't buy a property with expensive problems.
homeServices.service2Description: Back up your decision. We analyze price trends and neighborhood data so you know exactly when to buy, sell, or wait.
homeServices.service3Description: Manage family property. We handle the difficult details of inherited homes, downsizing, or managing multiple properties at once.
homeServices.service4Description: Increase your rent income. We review your contracts and local laws to make sure you are renting safely and for the best price.

homeWhy.title: Why Estanora
homeWhy.item1: Precision Market Analysis We use industry-leading tools for real-time monitoring and data-driven accuracy in every report.
homeWhy.item2: Specialized Expertise A dedicated team of 12 specialists with niche experience across technical, legal, and financial sectors.
homeWhy.item3: Institutional-Grade Due Diligence We apply the same rigorous auditing standards used by institutional investors to protect your private property interests.

aboutAgent.title1: Licensed Agent in Europe or the UK?
aboutAgent.description1: We partner with regulated real estate professionals who want independent analysis behind their client recommendations.
aboutAgent.item1: Independent due diligence support, pricing validation, risk mapping, and decision structure — delivered as clear, client-ready conclusions.
aboutAgent.item2: You stay client-facing. We stay analytical. No commission alignment, no transaction role — only advisory input.
aboutAgent.item3: Complex purchases, stalled sales, cross-border decisions, inherited or shared ownership cases, and rental/compliance questions.

aboutAnalytics.title: Responsible Use of Advanced Analytics and AI
aboutAnalytics.description: We use AI and advanced data tools to test market scenarios and ensure accuracy. This technology provides deeper analysis and faster results under professional oversight.
aboutAnalytics.item1: Scenario modelling under different market conditions
aboutAnalytics.item2: Sensitivity analysis for price, rent, and cost assumptions
aboutAnalytics.item3: Identification of anomalies and risk concentrations
aboutAnalytics.item4: Data-supported forecasts where sufficient evidence exists

aboutApproach.title: How We Approach Every Request
aboutApproach.description1: We treat all incoming requests as analytical cases, not sales enquiries.
aboutApproach.description2: Our process is structured as follows:
aboutApproach.text1: We review your situation, objective, and any available documentation to identify the core decision at stake.
aboutApproach.text2: We determine which factors materially affect the outcome: pricing, liquidity, regulation, technical condition, financing, or timing.
aboutApproach.text3: You receive a clear recommendation on the appropriate next step — due diligence, market research, portfolio review, or no action.
aboutApproach.text6: Assumptions are not supported by data
aboutApproach.text8: Our role is to reduce uncertainty — not to facilitate transactions.

aboutCore.service1Description: We provide advisory services only. We do not participate in transactions or receive third-party incentives.
aboutCore.service2Description: Each case follows a defined analytical process, ensuring consistency, traceability, and clarity of conclusions.
aboutCore.service3Description: Assumptions, limitations, and areas of uncertainty are stated explicitly and documented.
aboutCore.service4Description: All enquiries, data, and findings are handled confidentially and with professional care.
aboutCore.title: What You’ll Find in the Library

contactCta.title: Complex property decisions
contactCta.description: If you need independent validation before committing capital, this is the correct starting point.

contactMain.description1: Objective, Evidence-Based Guidance for Private Property Decisions. Real estate decisions involve capital allocation, legal exposure, and long-term financial consequences. They require more than opinions, listings, or general market commentary.
contactMain.description2: If you prefer direct communication, you may reach us via:
contactMain.item2: Your objective (buy, sell, hold, rent, portfolio, inheritance)
contactMain.item3: Any relevant timing constraints or deadlines
contactMain.note: Providing this information allows us to respond efficiently and with appropriate context.
contactMain.description4: Please provide sufficient detail to allow for a meaningful initial assessment.

contactSecond.description1: Precision Market Analysis We use industry-leading tools for real-time monitoring and data-driven accuracy in every report.

contactSecond.item2: Identifying hidden technical, legal or regulatory risks
contactSecond.item3: Deciding whether to buy, sell, hold, or wait
contactSecond.item4: Understanding why a property is not selling despite market exposure
contactSecond.item5: Structuring an inherited or jointly owned property
contactSecond.item6: Evaluating rental strategies under current legal frameworks

diligenceAudit.title: Unsure which audit you need?
diligenceAudit.description: Get a professional case revision at no cost. Schedule a free introductory call to discuss your property goals. We will help you identify the immediate risks and recommend the exact expert or audit required for your situation.

diligenceDifference.title: What’s the difference?
diligenceDifference.description1: A brief session to discuss your case details. We help you identify the right specialist and service for your needs.
diligenceDifference.resultDescription1: No professional advice or solutions provided.
diligenceDifference.description2: A deep-dive session focused entirely on solving your problem. We analyze your documents and provide actionable data.
diligenceDifference.noteDescription2: Up to 30% of our clients find their solution during this session and require no further services.

diligenceHero.title1: Verify the Property Before You Pay
diligenceHero.description: Stop guessing. We run the technical and legal checks so you don’t buy an expensive mistake

diligenceWhy.title: Why Due Diligence?
diligenceWhy.description: Whether you are buying, splitting an inheritance, or converting a rental, assumptions are your biggest financial risk. Our service replaces guesswork with technical and legal facts, ensuring your next move builds wealth instead of debt.

guidesCta.title: Not sure what’s blocking
guidesCta.description: We’ll identify the real driver — pricing, hidden risks, legal exposure, financing constraints, or timing — and show you the cleanest decision path.

guidesHero.title1: Make the Right Property Decision With Evidence, Not Assumptions
guidesHero.description: We analyse price reality, structural risks, legal exposure, and market timing so you know exactly when to buy, sell, hold, or restructure. Clarity replaces uncertainty. Strategy replaces guesswork.

leaseAdvisoryDifference.description1: A brief session to discuss your case details. We help you identify the right specialist and service for your needs.
leaseAdvisoryDifference.noteDescription1: No professional advice or solutions provided.
leaseAdvisoryDifference.description2: A deep-dive session focused entirely on solving your problem. We analyze your documents and provide actionable data.
leaseAdvisoryDifference.resultDescription2: Up to 30% of our clients find their solution during this session and require no further services.

leaseAdvisoryHero.description: Maximize your income and minimize legal risks.

leaseAdvisoryNeed.title: Unsure which service you need?
leaseAdvisoryNeed.description: Get a professional case revision at no cost. Schedule a free introductory call to discuss your property goals. We will help you identify the immediate risks and recommend the exact expert or audit required for your situation.

leaseAdvisoryServices.title: Our Lease Advisory Services
leaseAdvisoryServices.service1_1_description: We move beyond simple "market rates" to find the highest-performing tenant profile for your specific property. By analyzing current demand and local regulations, we determine which rental model, be it student housing, digital nomads, or traditional families—will generate the most stable profit.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service1_1_subtitle: For owners maximizing their rental yield.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service1_1_note: Strategic session to determine the optimal rental model for your property.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service1_1_description: A side-by-side ROI comparison between short-term (AirBnB), mid-term (corporate/nomad), and long-term (family) leasing.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service1_2_description: Analysis of local amenities and interior layout to identify which high-paying niche (students vs. expats) matches your asset.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service1_3_description: Researching and vetting smaller, "barrier-free" properties that fit your new health and mobility needs.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service1_4_description: A deep dive into management fees, cleaning, and maintenance costs to protect your net profit margins.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service1_5_description: Includes: Yield Modeling, Tenant Profiling, Pricing Roadmap, and Operational Audit.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service2_1_description: Rental laws are changing rapidly. We review your contracts and local zoning to ensure you are fully compliant with rent caps, eviction protections, and safety standards, shielding you from heavy fines and legal disputes.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service2_1_note: Legal/regulatory overview for landlords operating in high-restriction zones.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service2_1_description: An audit of your current lease agreements to identify loopholes and ensure compliance with the latest housing laws.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service2_2_description: Verification of the maximum legal rent you can charge and the allowed annual inflation adjustments.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service2_3_description: Ensuring the property meets all legal fire, health, and energy standards required for a rental license.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service2_4_description: Implementation of legally sound entry/exit protocols and deposit management strategies to minimize friction.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service2_5_description: Includes: Contract Review, Rent Cap Scan, Licensing Audit, and Dispute Protection.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service3_1_description: We identify underused areas within your property, such as basements, garages, or attics, and provide a roadmap to convert them into legal, income-generating rental units or workspaces.
leaseAdvisoryServices.service3_1_note: Initial walkthrough to identify "dead space" that can be converted to cash.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service3_1_description: Technical assessment of structural, plumbing, and electrical requirements for creating a separate rental unit.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service3_2_description: Direct confirmation with local authorities on whether a garage or basement conversion is legally allowed.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service3_3_description: Architectural suggestions to maximize the utility and appeal of small-footprint rental spaces.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service3_4_description: A financial projection showing how many months of rent it will take to pay off the conversion construction costs.
leaseAdvisoryServices.orderable_service3_5_description: Includes: Feasibility Study, Permit Verification, Layout Optimization, and Income Forecast.

leaseAdvisoryWhy.title: Why Lease Advisory?
leaseAdvisoryWhy.description: A poorly structured lease is a long-term financial liability. These services are crucial to ensure you don’t get locked into below-market rates, face unexpected legal fines, or miss out on high-yield opportunities hidden within your property’s square footage.

accountLoginPage.title: Need Assistance?
accountLoginPage.text2: Our support team is here to help.

marketResearchDifference.title: What’s the difference?
marketResearchDifference.description1: A brief session to discuss your case details. We help you identify the right specialist and service for your needs.
marketResearchDifference.noteDescription1: No professional advice or solutions provided.
marketResearchDifference.description2: A deep-dive session focused entirely on solving your problem. We analyze your documents and provide actionable data.
marketResearchDifference.resultDescription2: Up to 30% of our clients find their solution during this session and require no further services.

marketResearchHero.description: Don’t just buy a house; invest in a lifestyle and a financial future.

marketResearchNeed.title: Unsure which research you need?
marketResearchNeed.description: Get a professional case revision at no cost. Schedule a free introductory call to discuss your property goals. We will help you identify the immediate risks and recommend the exact expert or audit required for your situation.

marketResearchServices.title: Our Market Research Services
marketResearchServices.service1_1_description: We look beyond property walls to evaluate the daily reality of your location. Our data-driven concierge service ensures the neighborhood matches your lifestyle requirements for connectivity, mobility, and community.
marketResearchServices.service1_1_note: Get an immediate breakdown of which neighborhoods fit your specific lifestyle profile.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service1_1_description: Verification of actual (not advertised) fiber/5G speeds and mobile coverage stability for remote work.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service1_2_description: Mapping of essential services (healthcare, coworking, organic markets) within walking or cycling distance.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service1_3_description: Analysis of public transit efficiency, traffic patterns, and future infrastructure projects affecting local access.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service1_4_description: Detailed local crime statistics, street lighting quality, and noise level monitoring across different times of day.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service1_5_description: Includes: Connectivity Audit, 20-Minute City Score, Mobility Study, and Safety Report.
marketResearchServices.service2_1_description: We treat your home as a financial asset. By comparing your purchase price against historical data, micro-market trends, and urban development plans, we forecast the long-term appreciation potential of your investment.
marketResearchServices.service2_1_note: Discuss a specific property's potential with a market analyst before bidding.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service2_1_description: Comparative analysis of historical growth in the specific street/district versus city and regional averages.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service2_2_description: Identifying upcoming municipal projects (new parks, transit lines, or commercial hubs) that will drive future value.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service2_3_description: Predictive modeling of potential rental income based on current demand and legal short/long-term rental caps.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service2_4_description: Analysis of "days-on-market" for similar properties to determine how quickly you could exit the investment.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service2_5_description: Includes: Appreciation Benchmark, Development Scan, Rental Yield Analysis, and Liquidity Audit.
marketResearchServices.service3_1_description: Moving to a new region often carries hidden financial impacts. We provide a side-by-side comparison of the tax burdens, utility costs, and local maintenance fees to ensure your move is a smart financial transition.
marketResearchServices.service3_1_subtitle: For the "Strategic Mover" changing regions or cities.
marketResearchServices.service3_1_note: Strategic advice on the tax implications of relocating between specific regions.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service3_1_description: Detailed comparison of property taxes, wealth taxes, and local levies between your current and target location.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service3_2_description: A localized comparison of utility costs, insurance premiums, and municipal service fees specific to the property type.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service3_3_description: Estimating long-term upkeep costs based on local climate effects on building materials in that specific region.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service3_4_description: A professional estimate of actual moving costs, including specialized transport, insurance, and temporary storage.
marketResearchServices.orderable_service3_5_description: Includes: Regional Tax Audit, Cost of Living Indexing, Maintenance Forecast, and Logistics Budget.

marketResearchWhy.title: Why Research?
marketResearchWhy.description: Market data transforms speculation into strategy across every stage of your property journey. Whether you are buying, selling, or developing, our research identifies hidden risks and growth trends to maximize your financial outcome.

portfolioServicesDifference.description1: A brief session to discuss your case details. We help you identify the right specialist and service for your needs.
portfolioServicesDifference.noteDescription1: No professional advice or solutions provided.
portfolioServicesDifference.description2: A deep-dive session focused entirely on solving your problem. We analyze your documents and provide actionable data.
portfolioServicesDifference.resultDescription2: Up to 30% of our clients find their solution during this session and require no further services.

portfolioServicesHero.title2: Maximize the Value of Your Legacy
portfolioServicesHero.description: Manage your real estate as a high-performing asset.

portfolioServicesNeed.title: Unsure which service your portfolio needs?
portfolioServicesNeed.description: Get a professional case revision at no cost. Schedule a free introductory call to discuss your property goals. We will help you identify the immediate risks and recommend the exact expert or audit required for your situation.

portfolioServicesWhy.title: Why Manage Portfolio?
portfolioServicesWhy.description: Passive ownership often leads to tax leakage and missed growth opportunities. Professional portfolio management ensures your assets are physically sound, tax-optimized, and strategically aligned with your family’s long-term financial goals.

dueDiligenceServices.service1_1_description: We calculate the real math behind the renovation. We compare current repair quotes against the property’s future market value to ensure you don’t spend more on construction than the house is actually worth.
dueDiligenceServices.service1_1_note: Immediate verbal assessment of your project’s viability.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service1_description: Itemized breakdown of essential repairs (roof, plumbing, electrics) vs. aesthetic upgrades.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_description: Analysis of whether the purchase price + renovation costs will exceed the home's future market value.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_description: Confirming if your planned extensions or structural changes are legally allowed by local authorities.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service4_description: Analyzing external quotes to ensure you aren't being overcharged for the works.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service5_description: Renovation Cost Audit, Equity Protection, Permit Verification, and Quote Review.
dueDiligenceServices.service2_1_description: We check the efficiency of the building and the safety of the location. Our team reviews insulation quality, solar potential, and environmental risks (like flood or fire) to forecast your future utility bills and insurance costs.
dueDiligenceServices.service2_1_note: Speak with a sustainability specialist to prioritize your efficiency upgrades.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_1_description: Identifying "thermal leaks" and calculating the cost to upgrade to modern energy standards.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_2_description: Assessing roof orientation and local climate data for solar panels or rainwater harvesting.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_3_description: Detailed report on flood zones, soil stability, and local fire risks over the next 10–20 years.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_4_description: Identifying government grants or tax breaks available for energy-saving renovations.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service2_5_description: Includes: Efficiency Check, Solar Assessment, Hazard Mapping, and Subsidy Scan
dueDiligenceServices.service3_1_description: We verify if a property can be legally and physically divided. We inspect the layout for separate entrances and utility meters, while checking zoning laws to confirm you are allowed to split the title into two separate homes.
dueDiligenceServices.service3_1_subtitle: For family or partners splitting a property
dueDiligenceServices.service3_1_note: Consult with a structural strategist to determine if your co-buying plan is realistic.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_1_description: Architectural check to see if the building can be physically split into two private units (separate entrances, meters, etc.).
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_2_description: Reviewing local zoning laws to confirm if the property can be legally subdivided into two titles.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_3_description: Assessing the condition of common areas (roof, foundations, gardens) that both owners will be responsible for.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_4_description: Identifying potential issues with noise, privacy, and parking before you sign a co-ownership agreement.
dueDiligenceServices.orderable_service3_5_description: Includes: Physical Division Study, Legal Split Audit, Infrastructure Review, and Conflict Analysis

portfolioServices.service1_1_description: Professional guidance on how to handle inherited assets. We provide the financial and legal data needed to decide whether to sell for a clean exit, renovate for rental income, or keep the property as a family legacy.
portfolioServices.service1_1_note: Immediate strategic advice on tax implications and estate options.
portfolioServices.orderable_service1_1_description: A detailed plan to minimize the tax impact of transferring property titles between generations.
portfolioServices.orderable_service1_2_description: A side-by-side comparison of immediate sale proceeds versus long-term rental ROI and appreciation.
portfolioServices.orderable_service1_3_description: A roadmap for clearing legal encumbrances and preparing the home for the modern buyer.
portfolioServices.orderable_service1_4_description: Objective third-party valuations and split-scenario modeling to help heirs reach a fair agreement.
portfolioServices.orderable_service1_5_description: Includes: Tax Optimization, Financial Modeling, Market Prep, and Mediation Data.
portfolioServices.service2_1_description: A consolidated "Health Check" for your entire real estate portfolio. We audit every asset to ensure your holdings are tax-efficient, physically sound, and performing at their peak market potential.
portfolioServices.service2_1_subtitle: For private collectors and family offices.
portfolioServices.service2_1_note: Review your portfolio's high-level risks and performance gaps with a senior strategist.
portfolioServices.orderable_service2_1_description: A synchronized update of the current market value for all properties in your portfolio.
portfolioServices.orderable_service2_2_description: Identifying opportunities to restructure ownership or leverage local tax laws to reduce annual overhead.
portfolioServices.orderable_service2_3_description: Analyzing maintenance, insurance, and management fees across all assets to identify cost-saving leaks.
portfolioServices.orderable_service2_4_description: Assessment of your geographic and sector exposure (e.g., too much concentration in one city or asset type).
portfolioServices.orderable_service2_5_description: Includes: Valuation Audit, Tax Scan, Expense Review, and Risk Analysis.
portfolioServices.service3_1_description: Strategy for older owners or retirees looking to move into smaller, more efficient homes while safely liquidating the value stored in their current primary residence.
portfolioServices.service3_1_subtitle: For owners transitioning to a new lifestyle.
portfolioServices.service3_1_note: Strategic planning on how to unlock equity without losing financial security.
portfolioServices.orderable_service3_1_description: Calculating the exact cash-in-hand after taxes, fees, and the purchase of a smaller property.
portfolioServices.orderable_service3_2_description: Exploring financial products that allow you to receive income from your home while remaining in it.
portfolioServices.orderable_service3_3_description: Researching and vetting smaller, "barrier-free" properties that fit your new health and mobility needs.
portfolioServices.orderable_service3_4_description: Evaluating the change in local taxes and cost of living in the new neighborhood or retirement community.
portfolioServices.orderable_service3_5_description: Includes: Equity Forecast, Annuity Scan, Lifestyle Match, and Impact Audit.
